  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/4204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/4204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">No badis!</string>
            <string language="en">"Look out!"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"Blick heraus!"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"regard dehors!"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"olhar para fora!"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"sguardo fuori!"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Κοιτάξτε έξω!"</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull de materials didàctics interactius que ajuden a inculcar hàbits i mètodes de treball segurs, desenvolupar la cultura preventiva i sensibilitzar els i les alumnes davant la defensa de la pròpia salut i la de les persones que els envolten.</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of interactive teaching material to help pupils acquire safe work habits and methods, develop preventive thinking, and make them aware of the need for caring for their own health and that of people around them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">salut</string>
            <string language="en">health</string>
            <string language="es">salud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació per a la salut</string>
            <string language="en">health education</string>
            <string language="es">educación para la salud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">higiene</string>
            <string language="en">hygiene</string>
            <string language="es">higiene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">prevenció</string>
            <string language="en">prevention</string>
            <string language="es">prevención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació vial</string>
            <string language="en">road safety education</string>
            <string language="es">educación vial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">seguretat</string>
            <string language="en">safety</string>
            <string language="es">seguridad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">trànsit</string>
            <string language="en">traffic</string>
            <string language="es">tráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung interaktive Lehrmittel, zum der Pupillen 
zu helfen, sichere Arbeit Gewohnheiten und Methoden zu erwerben, das 
vorbeugende Denken zu entwickeln und sie bewußt zu bilden der 
Notwendigkeit am Interessieren für ihre eigene Gesundheit und der der
Leute um sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de matériel didactique interactif pour 
aider des pupilles à saisir des habitudes et des méthodes sûres de 
travail, à développer la pensée préventive, et à les mettre au 
courant du besoin de s'inquiéter de leur propre santé et de celui 
des personnes autour d'elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção do material de ensino interativo para ajudar
às pupilas adquirir hábitos e métodos seguros do trabalho, 
desenvolver pensar preventivo, e fazê-los cientes da necessidade para
importar-se com sua própria saúde e daquela dos povos em torno 
deles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di materiale didattico interattivo per 
aiutare le pupille ad acquistare le abitudini ed i metodi sicuri del 
lavoro, a sviluppare pensare preventivo ed ad informarli dell'esigenza
del preoccuparsi per la loro propria salute e di quella della gente 
intorno loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή του διαλογικού εκπαιδευτικού υλικού για να
βοηθήσει τους μαθητές να αποκτήσουν τις ασφαλείς συνήθειες και 
τις μεθόδους εργασίας, να αναπτύξουν την προληπτική σκέψη, και να
τους καταστήσουν ενήμερους για την ανάγκη για για την υγεία τους 
και αυτήν των ανθρώπων γύρω από τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
